description: Removal of Barriers to Biomass Power Generation in India, Phase-I

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Accelerate the adoption of environmentally sustainable biomass power technologies for captive and distributed biomass materials in niche areas through demonstration of project development models and establishment of sustainable business/support services network and undertaking enabling activities for removal of the key barriers.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Biomass Power Generation

title: Removal of Barriers to Biomass Power Generation in India
